column5: Wonderful family friendly, two story beach house with water and harbor views. Beautifully sunlit during the day. Opportunities for star gazing from the open upper deck at night and sunbathing during the day. Two minute walk to the pedestrian only beach, and a short ride to the popular nearby fishing pier and marina. The house is a total of 1,350 square feet and the only thing not available to guests is the ground floor storage area.
